item.title: Trump defends Saudi crown prince over Khashoggi murder: 'Things happen'
item.description: Mohammed bin Salman steps foot in the U.S. for the first time since Saudi critic Jamal Khashoggi's 2018 murder that caused global outrage.

item.description: Thune dismissed the idea that the Senate would amend the bill.
